He also died. 16 hrs ago Wales Milestone for women's and girls' football in Wales More than 20,000 girls and women are now registered to play football in Wales, marking a major milestone for the Football Association of Wales. 2 hrs ago Wales Women School taught me about bank accounts but not breast exams Resources will be made available in schools on women's health topics to reduce the gender health gap. 7 hrs ago Wales Major revamp of Wales' busiest station gets go-ahead The £140m upgrades to Cardiff Central aim to support passenger growth and reduce overcrowding. 3 hrs ago Wales Couple wed in front of strangers found on Reddit Harmony Elmy and Seán Mauremootoo eloped hundreds of miles to Cardiff for their unconventional wedding. 7 hrs ago Wales Clashes over state of NHS and Senedd expansion in TV debate Four Senedd hopefuls took part in the debate five months from a much anticipated election. Criticism over £18m grant for Wrexham football stand A finance expert says it is "unusual" to spend public money on a club owned by two Hollywood actors. Gavin & Stacey stars reunite for Christmas advert The pair return to our screens - but, sadly for fans, not for a Christmas special of the hit show. Police officer 'mortified' by footage of alleged groping PC Pamela Pritchard tells a misconduct hearing she is sorry for what happened at a leaving party. Reform politician's racist Chinese slur 'caused a lot of hurt' Members of Wales' Chinese community say seeing a politician use a racist slur is "very upsetting". Features & analysis Pole dance teacher forced to take up self-defence Anti-social behaviour means people are afraid to go to a pole dancing and fitness classes. Car made famous by Bond was left to rust on a drive - now it's worth £1m Local children jumped on the bonnet, and there was even a mouse nest in the highly-valuable car. Art celebrating quarry's wartime role unveiled by National Gallery The artworks were shipped to north Wales near the beginning of the war in order to keep them safe. I quit dating apps and found the love of my life After struggling to find meaningful connections on dating apps, Lowri met her fiance at a dinner party. HIV battle is not over, warns It's a Sin creator Russell T Davies says misinformation about the virus made him "despair". Watch/Listen Young women call for better health education New resources are being designed to improve understanding of common conditions. 7 hrs ago Wales Man tasered after taunting police Arron Dean was jailed for 26 weeks after appearing in Llandudno Magistrates’ Court. 19 hrs ago Wales Watch: Shopkeeper fights off robbery attempt with milk crate CCTV footage shows the shopkeeper being threatened with a knife by two women. 1 day ago Wales Politicians thrash out key issues in live TV debate They clashed over the NHS, the two-child benefit cap and increasing Senedd members. 15 hrs ago Wales Critically endangered rhino born at farm There are only 1471 eastern black rhinos left in the wild and 109 in zoos across Europe. 22 hrs ago Wales Sport Milestone for women's and girls' football in Wales More than 20,000 girls and women are now registered to play football in Wales, marking a major milestone for the Football Association of Wales. Can regions lift Wales with European success? As European rugby returns, Scarlets are hunting Champions Cup upsets while Cardiff, Dragons and Ospreys look to progress in the Challenge Cup. Harris targets stoppage on Cage Warriors debut Swansea's Ioan Harris targets a stoppage when he makes his Cage Warriors debut against George Staines in Newcastle on 6 December. Arms Park to host Welsh Celtic Challenge derby Cardiff Arms Park will host the Welsh Celtic Challenge festive derby between Gwalia Lightning and Brython Thunder on Saturday, 27 December. Wales can be team to avoid at World Cup - Tandy Wales boss Steve Tandy is confident his side will grow to be a team that others want to avoid at the 2027 Rugby World Cup.
